last_episode_to_air.name: Fallen
last_episode_to_air.overview: Series finale. As the world crumbles, can anyone stop Leanne?

name: Servant
overview: A Philadelphia couple are in mourning after an unspeakable tragedy creates a rift in their marriage and opens the door for a mysterious force to enter their home.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Season four brings the final chapter of the Turner story to an epic and emotional conclusion. Leanne’s war with the Church of Lesser Saints heightens, threatening Spruce street, the city of Philadelphia and beyond. Meanwhile, the shattered Turner family must not only confront the increasing threat of Leanne, but the certain reality that Dorothy is waking up. As the Turner family brownstone continues to crumble, questions are finally answered: who is Leanne Grayson and who is the child in their home?

episodes.name: Reborn
episodes.overview: Leanne, a young nanny, is hired to care for baby Jericho. But all is not as it seems.

episodes.name: Wood
episodes.overview: As Leanne settles in, Sean worries that Dorothy and Jericho are not in good hands.

episodes.name: Eel
episodes.overview: Sean enlists Dorothy's brother, Julian, to monitor her relationship with Leanne.

episodes.name: Bear
episodes.overview: Leanne disobeys an order and discovers why Sean is so protective of baby Jericho.

episodes.name: Cricket
episodes.overview: With Dorothy and Sean gone for the day, Leanne makes a new friend.

episodes.name: Rain
episodes.overview: Leanne's strange uncle arrives unexpectedly. Dorothy fights to keep her nanny.

episodes.name: Haggis
episodes.overview: Dorothy throws a tense dinner party. Sean entrusts Leanne to help keep a secret.

episodes.name: Boba
episodes.overview: Julian is forced to relive a dark memory during a night of babysitting.

episodes.name: Jericho
episodes.overview: Leanne acts out at Dorothy after learning the truth about baby Jericho.

episodes.name: Balloon
episodes.overview: After Jericho's baptism, uninvited guests force difficult decisions. Season finale.

episodes.name: Doll
episodes.overview: Jericho and Leanne are missing. Dorothy devises a 72-hour game plan, while Sean and Julian continue hiding the truth.

episodes.name: Spaceman
episodes.overview: With Natalie's help, Sean and Julian uncover disturbing details about the cult. Dorothy sacrifices her career reputation for her family.

episodes.name: Pizza
episodes.overview: The Turners open up a family business as a front for a more important mission.
With a new guest in the house, Dorothy resorts to bold tactics to get what she wants.

episodes.name: Cake
episodes.overview: The Turners scramble to prepare for a pivotal meeting. Leanne bakes a mysterious cake.

episodes.name: Espresso
episodes.overview: An unexpected visitor pushes everyone to their limits as Sean re-examines his past and Dorothy attempts to negotiate a delicate exchange.

episodes.name: Marino
episodes.overview: The Marino family tragedy raises more questions about Leanne. Uncle George’s presence in the house create a problem for the Turners.

episodes.name: Loveshack
episodes.overview: Dorothy and Sean get a hopeful sign. Leanne and Julian get to know each other better.

episodes.name: Goose
episodes.overview: As they wait for Jericho’s return, Dorothy and Sean pretend everything is fine at a tense Christmas Eve lunch.

episodes.name: Josephine
episodes.overview: An unexpected arrival threatens to tear Dorothy and Sean apart, leaving Leanne defenseless.

episodes.name: Donkey
episodes.overview: Three months after the attack, the Turners head down the shore. Left alone, Leanne has a more exciting day than she anticipated.

episodes.name: Hive
episodes.overview: Dorothy hosts a mommy-and-me group, but Leanne finds that she can’t trust strangers.

episodes.name: Hair
episodes.overview: Julian digs for the truth about Jericho. New visitors at the local park worry Leanne.

episodes.name: Ring
episodes.overview: Leanne continues to be upset by other people. Bad luck strikes the Turner brownstone.

episodes.name: Tiger
episodes.overview: The Turners attend a block party on Spruce Street. Leanne finally feels comfortable outside of the house, but she finds herself in danger.

episodes.name: Fish
episodes.overview: Sean’s dinner party goes south when Leanne is rude to a guest. Dorothy uncovers frightening details from the block party.

episodes.name: Camp
episodes.overview: Dorothy works with Veera to get Leanne out of the house, but Jericho and Leanne are more connected than they know.

episodes.name: Donut
episodes.overview: Isabelle threatens to uncover Dorothy’s past.

episodes.name: Commitment
episodes.overview: Dorothy and Frank hatch a plan to get Leanne out of the Turner household for good.

episodes.name: Mama
episodes.overview: Dorothy makes a desperate final plan. Season finale.

episodes.name: Pigeon
episodes.overview: The war between Leanne and the Church of the Lesser Saints reaches its peak.

episodes.name: Itch
episodes.overview: Leanne begins to torment Dorothy as chaos overtakes Spruce Street.

episodes.name: Séance
episodes.overview: Dorothy hires two live-in nurses to help speed up her recovery—and protect her from Leanne.

episodes.name: Boo
episodes.overview: Sean sees Leanne's true colors while she hunts her enemies on Halloween.

episodes.name: Neighbors
episodes.overview: Sean and Dorothy host the new neighbors on Spruce with plans to finally get Leanne out of the house.

episodes.name: Zoo
episodes.overview: The birthday party from hell ensues when the cult makes its boldest move yet with Leanne.

episodes.name: Myth
episodes.overview: Dorothy discovers a connection with Leanne. Uncle George shares information with the Turners.

episodes.name: Tunnels
episodes.overview: Sean and Julian make a decision about Leanne.

episodes.name: Awake
episodes.overview: Sean and Julian open up about a secret.

episodes.name: Fallen
episodes.overview: Series finale. As the world crumbles, can anyone stop Leanne?

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Season four brings the final chapter of the Turner story to an epic and emotional conclusion. Leanne’s war with the Church of Lesser Saints heightens, threatening Spruce street, the city of Philadelphia and beyond. Meanwhile, the shattered Turner family must not only confront the increasing threat of Leanne, but the certain reality that Dorothy is waking up. As the Turner family brownstone continues to crumble, questions are finally answered: who is Leanne Grayson and who is the child in their home?
